content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for considering my apartment. Based on the size and location, I would like to propose a rental price of 700 Euros per month. This is a fair market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in this area. Would you be interested in renting the apartment at this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month. Thank you for your offer. I am a student, so I am looking for a dependable and responsible landlord. Can you provide some information about your past experiences with tenants?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Certainly, Maria. I have been a landlord for several years and have had a number of tenants during that time. I have always been very particular about selecting tenants who are responsible and dependable, and I have had very few issues with my tenants in the past. I am confident that you will have a positive experience renting from me.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for the information. I would also like to know if there are any additional fees or costs that I should be aware of.

Also, when should I move in?

Thank you again for your offer.

I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Great, Maria. As for additional fees or costs, there will be a security deposit of one month's rent due upon signing the lease agreement. This will be returned to you at the end of the lease term, provided that you have fulfilled your obligations under the agreement.

As for the move-in date, we can work together to schedule a convenient time for you to move in. I suggest we discuss this further when we sign the lease agreement.

Thank you for agreeing to the rental price of 700 Euros per month. I look forward to having you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
